main.name: Brad Garner
main.description: I create pixel-perfect websites for Fortune 500 companies using HTML5, CSS3, jQuery and other technologies.
main.bio: Born in Tacoma, WA, I've lived in several states and 3 countries. I now call Arizona home. I'm married to a "California girl", and we have 2 amazing kids. I've lived a full life, including 8 years in the USAF - where I got my first overseas experience during Desert Storm - 9 years running my own photography business, and lots of stuff inbetween. I started using computers when I was 10 years old, in 1983, and never looked back from there. My first computer languages were DOS and Basic, and my first program made the computer play a song on the case speaker by varying the frequency. My current ambition is to learn React JS, and React Native, and get in on the ground floors of these technologies.

education.description: Classes consisted of PHP, MySQL, C#, and E-Commerce.

education.degree: A.A. Degree in Visual Communication with emphasis on Digital Multi Media Production
education.description: Visual Communications degree consisted of Graphic Design, Typography, Art History, Photography, Videography, Video Editing using AVID, Video Effects using AfterEffects, and Studio Photography.

work.title: Front End Interactive Developer
work.description: Utilizing resources provided to me from the Creative and Back End teams, I create responsive websites for desktop and mobile experience using HTML5, CSS3, jQuery, and a host of other technologies. We are a deadline-driven company with emphasis on pixel-perfect production sites with extremely fast turn time.

work.title: Front End Developer
work.description: Using HTML, CSS, and proprietary versions of a CSS framework, I build online corporate compliance sites for fortune 500 companies. Duties include, but not limited to, Front end developing using HTML and CSS; Video editing; Audio editing; Providing accessibility such as subtitles for video content.

skillsDescription.text: I'm a highly motivated, self-starting code monkey who is at home in GitHub as I am on Stack Overflow. I enjoy challening myself with new code languages, and pride myself on clean, semantic markup.

projects.title: RabidMonkee Gaming
projects.description: Primarily built so I could learn Foundation and the Twitch API, this is the site I call home.

projects.title: Select Pest Control
projects.description: A friend had a woefully outdated site. I used Wordpress to provide him with an updated portal for clients to view his services and contact him.

projects.title: Capital One Banking Reimagined
projects.description: Capital One Banking Reimagined site dedicated to the re-branding of Capital One.

projects.title: Johnsonville Brats First Brats Contest
projects.description: Social media aggragator for Johnsonville First Brats of the year photo contest.

projects.title: Chuck-E-Cheese 40th Birthday contest
projects.description: Enter to Win contest for Chuck-E-Cheese 40th birthday celebration.
